about_the_game: The main character, xiao Ming, seems to be caught in a trap.The first was a mass zombie siege on the streets.After repelling zombie group, be attracted by a few mysterious black shadow to a building site, although discovered a few clues, but immediately fell into the encircling circle of the corpse.It was not easy to escape, a series of fierce battles, xiaoming has a little tired, but this did not stop his pace forward.After successfully entering the laboratory, xiao Ming made a stupid mistake and forced himself into the underground of the research institute for investigation. In the scene like an underground maze, he almost ran out of ammunition and ran out of food.
detailed_description: The main character, xiao Ming, seems to be caught in a trap.The first was a mass zombie siege on the streets.After repelling zombie group, be attracted by a few mysterious black shadow to a building site, although discovered a few clues, but immediately fell into the encircling circle of the corpse.It was not easy to escape, a series of fierce battles, xiaoming has a little tired, but this did not stop his pace forward.After successfully entering the laboratory, xiao Ming made a stupid mistake and forced himself into the underground of the research institute for investigation. In the scene like an underground maze, he almost ran out of ammunition and ran out of food.
name: 生化工厂/Biochemical factory

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit | Windows 8 64-bit | Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 | AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit | Windows 8 64-bit | Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K | AMD Ryzen 5 1400 内存: 8 GB RAM
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible

short_description: The zombie is out!Their steps are faltering and bloodthirsty;Hideous face, but not high IQ;They are so excited by the smell of a living person that anyone who appears in front of a zombie is a target.To survive, everyone must take up arms and fight for their lives!
